value.name: Lawrence County Special Investigations Unit Executes Two Search Warrants
value.description: The Lawrence County District Attorney’s Office recently announced the execution of two search warrants by the Special Investigations Unit that took place in New Castle according to its social media page.

value.name: Tennessee Rep. Timothy Hill donates dozens of masks to 421 Area Volunteer Fire Department
value.description: Tennessee Rep. Timothy Hill donated dozens of masks to the first responders at the 421 Area Volunteer Fire Department after they expressed a need for N95 masks for precautions against COVID-19.
